title: Mayors Wrestles With How To Support Police And Grieving Residents
teaser: As the shooting of two New York City police officers increases pressure on that city's mayor and his comments about police abuses, it raises new questions: How does a mayor balance support for the police and for a community outraged by deadly police encounters with citizens? That's playing out across the country and especially in Cleveland, only there the division pits an African-American leader against a largely black constituency.
